column5: i remember when i had civics, mike, the coaches, actually, separated the room. we had our red party and we had our blue party and we would actually come together and debate. it was basically a debate class, and, but we would learn about what actually goes on in congress and what goes on in the senate and how to vote in elections. and, but we had fun doing it. i mean, this is something that the kids need to enjoy.
